recipeId.description: The ID of the recipe for the study.

slug.description: A slug to identify the study.

branch.description: The study branch in which the user is enrolled.

addonId.description: The ID of the extension installed by the study.

addonUrl.description: The URL of the XPI that was downloaded and installed by the study.

addonVersion.description: The version of the extension installed by the study.

studyStartDate.description: The start date for the study.

studyEndDate.description: The end date for the study.

extensionApiId.description: The record ID for the extension in Normandy server's database.

extensionHash.description: A hash of the extension XPI file.

extensionHashAlgorithm.description: The algorithm used to hash the extension XPI file.

functions.name: getStudy
functions.description: Returns a study object for the current study.

functions.name: endStudy
functions.description: Marks the study as ended and then uninstalls the addon.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: The reason why the study is ending.

functions.name: getClientMetadata
functions.description: Returns an object with metadata about the client which may be required for constructing survey URLs.

events.name: onUnenroll
events.description: Fired when a user unenrolls from a study but before the addon is uninstalled.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: The reason why the study is ending.
